# tf.contrib.keras.datasets.mnist.load_data

``` python
load_data(path='mnist.npz')
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/datasets/mnist.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/datasets/mnist.py).

Loads the MNIST dataset.

#### Arguments:

    path: path where to cache the dataset locally
        (relative to ~/.keras/datasets).


#### Returns:

    Tuple of Numpy arrays: `(x_train, y_train), (x_test, y_test)`.
